item.title: Git Gpg Verification
item.author: me@vpopov.org (Vadym Popov)
item.description: GPG and git on MacOS Setup Install https://gpgtools.org Create or import a key – see below for https://keybase.io Run gpg -K to see all private keys in current machine, use the key ID for the next step (each gpg key has subkeys with different capabilities, its better to choose subkey with sign S) Configure git to use GPG – replace the key with the one from gpg --K git config --global gpg.
